00018 template <typename T, int C>
00019 struct ei_traits< ndarray::EigenView<T,2,C> >{
00020     typedef typename boost::remove_const<T>::type Scalar;
00021     enum {
00022         RowsAtCompileTime = Dynamic,
00023         ColsAtCompileTime = Dynamic,
00024         MaxRowsAtCompileTime = Dynamic,
00025         MaxColsAtCompileTime = Dynamic,
00026         Flags = RowMajorBit | ((C>0) ? (DirectAccessBit|PacketAccessBit):0),
00027         CoeffReadCost = NumTraits<Scalar>::ReadCost
00028     };
00029 };
00030 
00031 template <typename T, int C>
00032 struct ei_traits< ndarray::EigenView<T,1,C> >{
00033     typedef typename boost::remove_const<T>::type Scalar;
00034     enum {
00035         RowsAtCompileTime = Eigen::Dynamic,
00036         ColsAtCompileTime = 1,
00037         MaxRowsAtCompileTime = Eigen::Dynamic,
00038         MaxColsAtCompileTime = 1,
00039         Flags = LinearAccessBit | DirectAccessBit | ((C==0) ? RowMajorBit:PacketAccessBit),
00040         CoeffReadCost = NumTraits<Scalar>::ReadCost
00041     };
00042 };

00057 template <typename T, int C>
00058 struct ei_traits< ndarray::TransposedEigenView<T,1,C> >{
00059     typedef typename boost::remove_const<T>::type Scalar;
00060     enum {
00061         RowsAtCompileTime = 1,
00062         ColsAtCompileTime = Eigen::Dynamic,
00063         MaxRowsAtCompileTime = 1,
00064         MaxColsAtCompileTime = Eigen::Dynamic,
00065         Flags = LinearAccessBit | DirectAccessBit | ((C==0) ? 0:(RowMajorBit|PacketAccessBit)),
00066         CoeffReadCost = NumTraits<Scalar>::ReadCost
00067     };
00068 };

00075 template <typename T, int N, int C>
00076 class EigenView {
00077     BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(T)<0); // Only 1d and 2d views allowed.
00078 };
00079 
00080 template <typename T, int N, int C>
00081 class TransposedEigenView {
00082     BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(T)<0); // Only 1d and 2d views allowed.
00083 };

00091 template <typename T, int C>
00092 class EigenView<T,2,C> : public Eigen::MatrixBase< EigenView<T,2,C> > {
00093 public:
00094 
00095     EIGEN_GENERIC_PUBLIC_INTERFACE(EigenView);
00096 
00097     explicit EigenView(Array<T,2,C> const & array) : _array(array) {}
00098 
00099     EIGEN_INHERIT_ASSIGNMENT_OPERATORS(EigenView);
00100 
00101     Scalar * data() { return const_cast<Scalar*>(_array.getData()); }
00102     Scalar const * data() const { return _array.getData(); }
00103 
00104     inline int rows() const { return _array.template getSize<0>(); }
00105     inline int cols() const { return _array.template getSize<1>(); }
00106 
00107     inline int stride() const { return _array.template getStride<0>(); }
00108 
00109     inline Scalar & coeffRef(int row, int col) { return const_cast<Scalar&>(_array[makeVector(row,col)]); }
00110     inline Scalar const coeff(int row, int col) const { return _array[makeVector(row,col)]; }
00111 
00112     inline Scalar & coeffRef(int index) { return const_cast<Scalar&>(_array[makeVector(index,0)]); }
00113     inline Scalar const coeff(int index) const { return _array[makeVector(index,0)]; }
00114 
00115     template<int LoadMode>
00116     inline PacketScalar packet(int row, int col) const {
00117         return Eigen::ei_ploadt<Scalar,LoadMode>(&_array[makeVector(row,col)]);
00118     }
00119 
00120     template<int StoreMode>
00121     inline void writePacket(int row, int col, const PacketScalar& x) {
00122         Eigen::ei_pstoret<Scalar,PacketScalar,StoreMode>(&_array[makeVector(row,col)], x);
00123     }
00124 
00125     template<int LoadMode>
00126     inline PacketScalar packet(int index) const {
00127         return Eigen::ei_ploadt<Scalar,LoadMode>(&_array[makeVector(index,0)]);
00128     }
00129 
00130     template<int StoreMode>
00131     inline void writePacket(int index, const PacketScalar& x) {
00132         Eigen::ei_pstoret<Scalar,PacketScalar,StoreMode>(&_array[makeVector(index,0)], x);
00133     }
00134 
00135     Array<T,2,C> const & getArray() const { return _array; }
00136 
00137     void setArray(Array<T,2,C> const & array) { _array = array; }
00138 
00139 private:
00140     Array<T,2,C> _array;
00141 };

00150 template <typename T, int C>
00151 class EigenView<T,1,C> : public Eigen::MatrixBase< EigenView<T,1,C> > {
00152 public:
00153 
00154     EIGEN_GENERIC_PUBLIC_INTERFACE(EigenView);
00155 
00156     explicit EigenView(Array<T,1,C> const & array) : _array(array) {}
00157 
00158     EIGEN_INHERIT_ASSIGNMENT_OPERATORS(EigenView);
00159 
00160     Scalar * data() { return const_cast<Scalar*>(_array.getData()); }
00161     Scalar const * data() const { return _array.getData(); }
00162 
00163     inline int rows() const { return _array.template getSize<0>(); }
00164     inline int cols() const { return 1; }
00165 
00166     inline int stride() const {
00167         return (C==1) ? _array.template getStride<1>() : _array.template getStride<0>();
00168     }
00169 
00170     inline Scalar & coeffRef(int row, int) { return const_cast<Scalar&>(_array[row]); }
00171     inline Scalar const coeff(int row, int) const { return _array[row]; }
00172 
00173     inline Scalar & coeffRef(int index) { return const_cast<Scalar&>(_array[index]); }
00174     inline Scalar const coeff(int index) const { return _array[index]; }
00175 
00176     template<int LoadMode>
00177     inline PacketScalar packet(int row, int) const {
00178         return Eigen::ei_ploadt<Scalar,LoadMode>(&_array[row]);
00179     }
00180 
00181     template<int StoreMode>
00182     inline void writePacket(int row, int, const PacketScalar& x) {
00183         Eigen::ei_pstoret<Scalar,PacketScalar,StoreMode>(&_array[row], x);
00184     }
00185 
00186     template<int LoadMode>
00187     inline PacketScalar packet(int index) const {
00188         return Eigen::ei_ploadt<Scalar,LoadMode>(&_array[index]);
00189     }
00190 
00191     template<int StoreMode>
00192     inline void writePacket(int index, const PacketScalar& x) {
00193         Eigen::ei_pstoret<Scalar,PacketScalar,StoreMode>(&_array[index], x);
00194     }
00195 
00196     Array<T,1,C> const & getArray() const { return _array; }
00197 
00198     void setArray(Array<T,1,C> const & array) { _array = array; }
00199 
00200 private:
00201     Array<T,1,C> _array;
00202 };

00326 template <typename T, int N, int C>
00327 inline EigenView<T,N,C>
00328 viewAsEigen(Array<T,N,C> const & array) {
00329     return EigenView<T,N,C>(array);
00330 }
